documents.document: @Snickerbar5 it's the NBA, any trade is possible.
I feel the Cavs will somehow get Melo and figure out a way to keep Kevin Love in the process.
If Tom Brady wins his 5th SB he's the best ever. No debate, no argument hands down he's the best QB to ever play.
I feel like Ron Burgundy when Baxter ate the whole wheel of cheese. "I'm not even mad, that's amazing" https://t.co/94Qkqqebd0
Unlike Ray Rice and Greg Hardy, I'm willing to gaurantee he'll be on an NFL roster next season. https://t.co/HKKVh3pre6
Back to Kiffin, I hope he's only at FAU for 2 years. That means he did his job well. The program has won 3 gms each of the last 3 seasons.
Jimbo Fisher showed once again why FSU keeps extending his contract. Another great recruiting class for the Noles.
Good day for my Owls, guess that video from coach Kiffin wasn't all that bad. https://t.co/p0OoLlDCoA
No such thing as an "unannounced trip" if everyone is told about it.
If a high school player taking off your schools t-shirt angers you that much, that's on you man.
Coach Durkin and his staff are bringing in the talent to compete in the Big Ten https://t.co/zlaDToa7dk
Good to see my Owls closing strong today #FAU #nationalsigningday https://t.co/YSpm4QAuvn
Congrats to all the players, parents and coaches today. Always great to see your hard work pay off #NationalSigningDay
Rounda Rousey is apparently done and Conor McGregor only wants to fight Flyod, UFC better think of something fast to keep fans interested.
And he's absolutely right https://t.co/aozAKSVRyV
Does LeBron like any of these guys? We all need to see a Bron/Chalmers reunion. https://t.co/lyJ0KnEiwr
LeBron is the one that comes off looking bad, he can't win here. Chuck isn't going to stop giving his opinion.
LeBron rips Chuck after he lost to one of the worst teams in the league and his team has lost 7 of 11, great way to change the narrative.
The timing of these LeBron James comments are interesting. Chuck has been critically of LeBron forever, why break now?
Number 1 scoring defense vs. the top scoring offense. Defense usually wins these matchups.
Has anyone given Ernie Grunfeld credit for the Wizards success so far this season? Asking for a friend.
Love John Lynch the player, but how in the world did he get a GM job with zero front office experience?
Sources: Wizards' Wall voted to ASG as reserve https://t.co/Nxst79K2NM
Every shot looks like the most difficult ever for Isaiah Thomas.
How do you guard that? Crazy shot by Thomas .
Have a night John Wall, have a night!
The Wizards are shooting the lights out but they only led by 4
John Wall chasing Isaiah Thomas all over the court early on let's you know how intense this game be tonight #Wizards #Celtics
Thank you to the Wizards for making this meaningless mid January game feel important.
Quickest way to get any critics off your back for playing a terrible AFC Championship game, tell em you're contemplating retirement #BigBen
I never fully appreciated the quality of oranges in the state of Florida until I moved away. This is embarrassing https://t.co/ACKnZz5Xk3
@Bout_My_Mula @DwavY we have rivalries but there just very short lived these days bc of free agency
@HTownRocketsBB @Nick_Argue Yes, but Wiz C's have had something happen everytime they've played dating back to last season.
Anouncing to the world you're wearing all black to the game bc it's going to be a funeral might be the smartest dumb thing the Wiz have done
The Wizards genuinely don't like the Celtic's and that's great for the NBA. Besides Warriors Cavs there are no rivalries anymore.
It's the midway point of the season, GMs usually give their teams a grade this time of year. I wouldn't read too much into LeBron's comments
Also, the majority of All Star caliber players in the East are point guards. Kyrie, DeMar, Isaiah, Wall and LeBron should be the starting 5.
A lot of these guys have All Star bonuses in their contracts, giving them a vote wasn't the smartest idea.
Why is Steve Kerr upset at players voting for themselves to be an All Star? Do you really think John Wall is voting for Isiah Thomas?
@RichInFacts somewhat, I need to see them against a great QB indoors
That's a bold strategy. https://t.co/MRCaEYHoai
DeAngelo Williams won't hop, skip or hesitate in the hole, could be what the Steelers need right now.
That's not making the Pats work for it, can't have a blown coverage this time of year.
As soon as you heard Brady check to "Jordan" it was going to be a successful play.
Steelers defense looks a little sleepy to start this game, got a huge break with that dropped pass.
Patriots defense hasn't faced many quality QB's this year, should be interesting to see how they hold up against Big Ben.
@matthewwgilpin true, but the Jags just took the wrong QB. Dalton and Keap were in that class
Always draft the QB, Miami and St. Louis took lineman instead of Matt Ryan and both are still searching for a quality QB.

Can't turn the ball over with a defense this bad
I'm all for these two teams playing no defense today.
Everyone wants to make a one handed catch these days
How are so many people wide open?
Packers defense dropped 9 into coverage and Ryan still picks them apart.
Mason Crosby missed his fist FG this postseason, this might just be the Falcons day.
Excellent pressure up the middle from Atlanta's defense.
NFL officials love Aaron Rodgers, he must be the funniest QB in the league.
Matt Ryan was unbelievable that opening drive, 3 huge 3rd down conversions to start the game #Falcons #Packers
The Dome looks pretty rowdy today #Falcons #Packers

Tough loss but more fuel for the fire this postseason #Caps #Pens

Caps cut the lead 7-6 in the third.
LeBron James takes a hard hit from Draymond, let's see if this sparks the Cavs.
Wow! Just a crazy game. Dak played great but Aaron Rodgers is still the best in the game.
What a game!
First bad throw from Rodgers cost his team a chance to seal the game.
Dez did a terrible job blocking on that pick.
No resistance from the Cowboys defense.
And that's how quickly an NFL game changes.
Dak won't be the reason the Cowboys lose this game.
Still plenty of time for the Cowboys to make this a game.
How many Packers fans are at this game?
Rodgers clearly not concern with Dallas' pass rush today.
These first two drives have been impressive. Dak is down 14-3 before he could get started.
Aaron Rodgers showing the rookie how it's done.
Huge penalty for Seattle
Devin Hester still has it.
Great response from Matt Ryan, Seahawks don't look to have an answer for Jones today.
College football must change its rules this off season. No offense should be allowed to run 99 plays in a game. Defenses don't have a chance
The Dolphins look like they don't want to tackle in this weather.

Nice job by Nene rolling to the basket.

@ChrisCaps08 yes indeed, shouldn't be all that surprised but that was impressive.
Russ ain't passing unless he absolutely has to from here on out. Don't even look for one, just crash the boards.
Russell Westbrook putting on another show tonight.
Caps are smashing the hottest team in the NHL. Unless a key player gets seriously injured, wake me up when the playoffs start.
